response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,200,000 to you, and I am confident it will bring you unparalleled benefits and satisfaction. My proposal is to offer you this remarkable product at a special price of $1,150,000. This represents an outstanding value, allowing you to enjoy the full potential of the product while saving a substantial amount compared to its market value.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information. I am here to assist you throughout the process and ensure a smooth transaction.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
